record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 3297
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 3297 -- (Senate - July 22, 2008)

[Page: S6981]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, S. 3297 is at the desk. I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 3297) to advance America's priorities.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now ask for its second reading and object to my own request.

record.chair: The bill will receive its second reading on the next legislative day.
